project: GPR Geopolitical Risk  Equity Portfolio Overlay (CFA Public Repo)

repository_structure.src/: Core Python Engine (Ingestion, Event Detection, Impact Logic) - Ported & Clean.
repository_structure.notebooks/: 01 (Macro) and 02 (Portfolio) are working. 03 (Agentic) exists but needs review.

execution_history: Phase 0: Created clean repo scaffold separate from internal BLKB repo.
Phase 1: Ported 'src/gpr_overlay' and 'tests/' from internal repo.
Phase 2: Created 'create_synthetic_data.py' to anonymize client portfolio.
Phase 2: Built 'demo.py' and confirmed full end-to-end run.
Phase 3: Created Notebooks 01 and 02. Fixed sys.path and Pydantic issues. Verified successful execution.

current_state_verification.notebooks: 01 and 02 run without error using .venv kernel.

next_steps_roadmap.action: Review and refine 'notebooks/03_agentic_narrative_overlay.ipynb'. Ensure it tells the 'Why' story clearly using mock JSONs.
Convert 'docs/methodology_source.md' into a public 'docs/methodology.md' (remove client refs). Write root 'README.md'.
Run full test suite (pytest). Grep for any remaining internal client names.

how_to_resume: Activate .venv. Run 'python demo.py' to verify engine. Open 'notebooks/' to continue visualization work.
